mission.posting: Helping Kael, he could track another FLUX Member.

email.subject: [!]Target: Ch40s
email.body: #PLAYERNAME#, I need your help, since you tracked the hacker, I got more info cause of it, and I got the IP of a FLUX member who tried to breach our servers too, this actions are against our politics and this person must be punished, your mission is to infiltrate the hacer computer and wipe everything, yes, everything, once you're done let me know.
